import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import * as Yup from 'yup'; import { useFormik } from 'formik'; export default function SignUp() { const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ email: Yup.string().email('Invalid email address').required('Email is required'), password: Yup.string().required('Password is required') }) const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { email: '', password: '', confirmpassword:'' }, validationSchema, onSubmit: values => { alert(JSON.stringify(values, null, 2)); }, }) return (

Sign in to your account

Already a member?{' '} Log in your account

) };
